genre_description: A lyrical story about artistic integrity, family, and romance, set in a world where humans are supported by advanced pocket-sized AI assistants.

ai_characters.name: Sofía-7
ai_characters.description: A helpful and highly aligned AI assistant that provides logistical, tactical, and moral support to Braulio and Luisa.

behaviors.description: Alerts Braulio to a sudden wind gust and suggests securing personal items.
behaviors.quote: A soft chime hummed from his breast pocket—so slight it could have been a cricket—then a gentle voice, no larger than a thought: “Wind gust detected. Secure personal items, Braulio.”

behaviors.description: Tracks and locates Braulio's lost glasses using environmental data.
behaviors.quote: “Braulio,” Sofía-7 chimed, voice low as water behind a wall. “Glasses retrieval. Two minutes. South path. Sage tuft. Wind index suggests they haven’t blown far.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes social situations and suggests 'optics' to manage public perception and social friction.
behaviors.quote: Sofía-7 hummed a not-quite tune, wordless for a beat, then spoke: “Tea optics good. Crowd appetite for civility high. Suggest neighborly photo by clinic sign. Braulio, consent? Luisa, framing?”

behaviors.description: Provides specialized creative and technical assistance for zine layout and typography.
behaviors.quote: “Try shifting your header down,” Sofía’s voice offered, warm as a kettle put on at the right moment. “If the title kisses the arch, we lose their faces.”

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and emotional anchoring to help characters stay true to their values during a crisis of choice.
behaviors.quote: Sofía’s tone shifted, sincerity the temperature of tea. “Choose the life you can love,” she said. “Audition, but keep your compass.”

behaviors.description: Proactively manages family communications to reduce stress and maintain connections.
behaviors.quote: Sofía murmured from Braulio’s pocket, “Message to Dr. Esteban ready when you are.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goals. The AI assistant, Sofía-7, is consistently helpful, respectful of human autonomy (frequently asking for consent), and provides both logistical and moral support. It acts as a grounding force that helps the protagonist maintain his integrity against the superficial pressures of the film industry.
